title: New Vol'koz Skin Idea
body:
I know that **Arclight Vel'Koz** has already been announced, but I had this brainwave not that long ago about a skin that would go with Ocean week.

**Jellyfish Vel'Koz**. He already has tentacle appendages, and his eye could be the "bell" of the jellyfish. When he moves and Recalls, he sort of already looks like a jellyfish. He already attacks with bolts of what looks like electricity, so just giving his AA a blue tinge wouldn't be that hard (I imagine. I'm in no way experienced with computer animation or design. This is me just sharing my ideas). His Q - *Plasma Fission* - could be turned into a ball of water, or blue energy. His W - *Void Rift* - could open a trench in the ground, and when the explosion happens, a sort of pulse of water could be sent out of it, much like an underwater volcano or geyser. His E - *Tectonic Disruption* - could look similar to {{champion:267}} **Nami's** *Aqua Prison* with the bubble and everything, except that they don't sit there and float, they just get a normal knock up (and sometimes, back). His Ultimate - *Life Form Disintegration Ray* - could be a forcefully ejected jet of water, like a fire hose.

An alternative to the jellyfish idea could be an Octopus or Squid Vel'Koz, where the water could be substituted for ink. I guess that already matches more with the style of Vel'Koz; black, ominous, and sinister ink.

Anyway, just thought I'd share my idea with the community and my fellow summoners.

"Thank you for your contribution." - {{champion:161}}

replies.body:
It seems you really like tentacles buddy,

Don't blame you, I like watching them in action too.

Really though, a lot of void creatures and the afflicted have the Deep Sea skin, Vel, Kha and hopefully Rek should get theirs too.

I'm not too sure what you're implying with the "watching them in action" part, but I'm going to assume you mean them kicking ass, to which I say, yes I do. I think it's fun to play Vel'Koz and burst people down from full to zero in around 2 seconds.

I wouldn't be too fussed if this didn't actually become an official skin, I'm just trying to share my ideas with the community. But if it did, I would be so happy. :D
Yes I knew what he meant. I was just trying to avoid it for the sake of maturity.
No one is mature on the internet
Haha, that is actually one of the funniest ideas for a skin I've ever heard of that I really would like to see in-game. I can just imagine that ult though. "Tomato sauce laser" xD
